warnings.name: once
warnings.prose: The primary behavior is triggering the associated animation.

warnings.name: repeat
warnings.prose: The primary behavior is triggering the associated animation. The inverse behavior is resetting the associated animation effect back to its before phase and its associated animationâ€™s start time to zero.

warnings.name: alternate
warnings.prose: The inverse behavior is reversing the associated animation.

warnings.name: state
warnings.prose: The primary behavior is triggering or resuming the associated animation. The inverse behavior is pausing the associated animation.

warnings.name: idle
warnings.prose: The animation effect associated animation remains in its before phase and stays at zero start time.

warnings.name: primary
warnings.prose: When switched to this value the primary behavior type defined by type is applied to animation.

warnings.name: inverse
warnings.prose: When switched to this value the inverse behavior type defined by type is applied to animation.
